topic.title: Rental Return Checklist
topic.shortdesc: Below you'll find a quick checklist to ensure that you aren't missing anything that will cause a late fee on your rental upon return.

li.p: Make sure all chargers and the rented product are brought back in the Virginia Tech case that they came in.
Bring a credit card or cash to pay your rental fee if you have not already paid online.

p.b: If any of these steps are incomplete, you will be charged a $25 late fee.
